description:
Variation of condition 7(i) (refuse & recycling facilities, biomass boiler, floor/ceiling insulation and rainwater harvesting systems only, equipment to control emission of fumes and smells from the ground floor A3/A5 unit) of planning permission Ref: PP/2010/1961 dated 23/09/2010 allowed on appeal Ref: APP/A5270/A/11/2149773 dated 25/10/2011, for Internal and external alterations, including the installation of a new shop front and front entrance to access the upper floors of 50-54, construction of first and second floor rear extensions, creation of a third floor within the roof space and third floor rear extension, mansard extension to the front roofslope and the formation of 1st, 2nd and 3rd floor terraces in conjunction with the formation of a ground floor A3/A5 unit and 17 Apartment/Hotel (apart-hotel) units, with associated ground floor cycle parking, refuse storage and disabled parking space to the rear (part retrospective application); to allow for details to be discharged for equipment to control emission of funes and smells from the ground floor A3/A5 unit prior to occupation of the unit: - 
 
 It is hereby confirmed that condition 7 of appeal Decision APP/A5270/A/11/2149773 be varied as follows:
 
 7. The use of the building hereby permitted shall cease and the mansard roof shall be removed and the roof reinstated to its former condition, within 6 months of the date of the failure to meet any one of the requirements set out in (i) to (iv) below:(i)	Within 3 months of the date of this decision, a scheme for the provision of:a.	Refuse storage and recycling activitiesb.	Equipment to control the emission of fumes and smell from the ground floor A3/A5 unit be submitted prior to occupation and commencement of use.c.	A biomass boiler including fuel type and delivery strategyd.	Insulation of the floor/ceiling between the ground floor commercial premises and the apart-hotel units abovee. A rainwater harvesting systemShall have been submitted for the written approva
